articles.description: Star Wildcats player Bryce Cotton signs a new three-year contract just weeks after quitting the club when player salaries were cut in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
Less than four weeks after opting out of his previous contract, Bryce Cotton has returned to the Perth Wildcats on a new three-year deal, saying he couldn't be happier sharing the news.

articles.content:
